tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_id INT,
    update_description TEXT,
    update_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (patch_id) REFERENCES game_patch_notes(patch_id)
);

CREATE TABLE esports_players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    player_team VARCHAR(50),
    last_update_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (last_update_id) REFERENCES game_updates(update_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatchNotes (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_version VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    patch_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatchUpdates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_id INT REFERENCES PatchNotes(patch_id),
    update_date DATE,
    update_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Developers (
    developer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    developer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    developer_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EsportsPlayers (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    game_id INT REFERENCES PatchNotes(patch_id)
)
